data.text: Patsani mwana wa mfumu nzeru zanu zoweruzira mwa chilungamo,
Iye adzaweruza anthu anu mwachilungamo,
Mapiri adzabweretsa chuma kwa anthu anu,
Iye adzateteza ozunzika pakati pa anthu
Adzakhala ndi moyo pa mibado yonse,
Iye adzakhala kugwa kwa mvula pa minda yolimidwa
Mʼmasiku a munthu wolungama adzakhazikika;
Iye adzalamulira kuchokera ku nyanja ina mpaka ku nyanja ina
Mafuko a mʼchipululu adzawerama pamaso pake
Mafumu a ku Tarisisi ndi a ku zilumba zakutali
Mafumu onse adzamuweramira
Pakuti iye adzawombola wosowa amene akulira,
Iye adzachitira chifundo anthu ofowoka ndi anthu osowa
Iye adzalanditsa iwo ku mazunzo ndi chiwawa
Iye akhale ndi moyo wautali;
Mulole kuti tirigu achuluke mʼdziko lonse;
Dzina lake likhazikike kwamuyaya,
Matamando akhale kwa Yehova Mulungu, Mulungu wa Israeli
Matamando akhale ku dzina lake laulemerero kwamuyaya
Uku ndiko kumaliza kwa mapemphero a Davide mwana wa Yese.
